name: Truck it up
description:
Are you ready for the most intense arcade truck driving game? Do you think you:

- Can safely get a truck from point A to point B?
- Can effectively manage your fuel?
- Can survive the most demanding roads?

If you answered YES, then download the game now and see for yourself!


You’re almost at the end of your journey! There’s a last streak before you and it’s up to you to reach the finish line. Tap the screen and go! Can you make it with whatever fuel you have left?
